event.title: was platted by Enoch Cox in 1836

data.event: Darlington was platted by Enoch Cox in 1836.

event.title: made stops in Darlington for many years

data.event: The Pennsylvania Rail Road (Vandalia district) made stops in Darlington for many years from the late 19th century up until the 1960s.

event.title: June 2, 1990, an F-3 tornado touched down

data.event: On June 2, 1990, an F-3 tornado touched down southwest of Darlington and destroyed multiple homes, barns, and property around the area.
